summary: I'd love a matchup! I'm a 5'3" straight girl, ENFJ-T, Slytherpuff, ambivert, Taurus with Scorpio rising, and curvy. I enjoy...
question: I'd love a matchup! I'm a 5'3" straight girl, ENFJ-T, Slytherpuff, ambivert, Taurus with Scorpio rising, and curvy. I enjoy edm/hip hop dancing to unwind occasionally, work hard making cosplay/Etsy crafts to support myself, and love absurd/self-deprecating humor and making people laugh. I'm working on staying present to get out of my own head, and tend to Bakurage when around bad driving/stupidity. Touch starved but trepidatious about it. I love my cat, good storytelling, and genuine people!
answer:
✎ Denki Kaminari

  • denki’s the one for you!
  • he’s a huge fan of edm and hip hop, so there will always be music playing at full blast in your house. he’d happily go to every single concert with you that the two of you can get to and will probably always surprise you with concert tickets on your birthday and at christmas without fail. he loves to dance with you at these concerts too, or just around the house and he loves to derp out with you when you do. its a great opportunity for him to have lots of fun and just unwind with you.
  • he admires the fact that you work really hard on your cosplay and etsy crafts and will help you here and there. he isn’t the most creative of people, and he’s a bit of a klutz so he probably messes up a lot of your creations, but he tries his best. if you want him to he’ll leave you alone to your own devices, and he’ll definitely go out and buy you all the materials you need to make your cosplays and crafts.
  • he always laughs at your jokes, there’s never been someone who can make him laugh as hard as you do and he can always guarantee that you’ll cheer him up. his stomach always hurts after he spends time with you from laughing too much, and he’ll probably be laughing for days after at the random jokes you make. the two of you have tonnes of inside jokes, and whenever one of you says a word relating to that joke you can’t stop laughing.
  • that being said, he hates it whenever you make self-deprecating jokes about yourself. he’s scared that you actually think that about yourself, and he always makes sure to tell you that you’re gorgeous and he loves you. he’ll cuddle you a whole bunch and just love you up. whenever someone laughs at those jokes he just glares at them until the stop laughing because no one will laugh at his girl.
  • he loves that you’re trying to stay in the present, as he loves to live in the moment - he thinks its the only way to live. he’ll encourage you to stay present whenever you can and whenever he detects that you’re going into yourself again then he’ll bring you back.
  • denki’s a bit immune to your bakurage, he won’t realise that you’re incredibly angry until you’re at your tipping point, but he’s actually quite quick to diffuse the situation. normally he’d push bakugou over the edge, but he learned the hard way to not taunt you further. he advises anyone to not find themselves on the receiving end of your rage.
  • he loves affection, but will never force you into anything you want to do. he’ll let you take your time, and everything is at your own pace. of course when you finally start to express affection he’ll be more than happy to return it. he loves cuddling you and pressing kisses all over your face. he’s absolutely enamored by you and will always remind you how much he loves you.

written on 02/05/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THESE MATCH-UPS ARE JUST FOR FUN AND IF YOU DON’T LIKE THEM I’M SORRY! I TRY MY BEST AND PICK SOMEONE BASED ON WHAT I THINK AND IF YOU DON’T AGREE THAT’S FINE BUT NO HATE PLS <3 I TRY MY BEST!

blog.name: xoxteeumblegirloxo
blog.title: XoxTeeUmbleGirlieoxO
blog.description: I totally reblog and heart the shiz outta BNHA characters, Naruto, Borusara, eden zero, and I post random stuff! Hiiiiiii~!

summary: Yo, so I found an app which is like total amazing-ness. Since I lack any art ability it assisted me in creating a portrait. And...
body:
Yo, so I found an app which is like total amazing-ness. Since I lack any art ability it assisted me in creating a portrait. And here is my bnha OC I made on the app.

BNHA OC: Tamara (last) Mizu (first)

Hero name: Aqua

Occupation: UA student

Age: 15-16

Quirk: Aqua body

Present Mic Quirk Explonation: Tamara’s quirk gives her the ability to turn into any form of water that she desires, from liquid to steam water her entire body can turn into a puddle or a cloud of steam, along with this ability she can also use water as a weapon, her hair is also essential, since it too functions as water, and having it long gives her an advantage.

Also—this OC has feelings for Bakugou—So… I kinda made their Love Child. Yep I have WAYYY too much free time.

Because of Mizu’s hairstyle you can’t see it, but she too has that little beautimark where (Tasuki ^) That’s her name, has it.

Tasuki is a huge GROUND ZERO fan. She’s a kind, but also kinda spoiled girl. She is the second oldest to a total of 4 kids.

She has an older sister, her, and two little twins, a boy and girl. While her siblings have either their mom or dads quirk Tasuki has a mixture—Lava hands. She can change her normal hands into lava at will. Like her mom she can use it as weapons but she is limited to her hands.

Yeah. I’ve thought this through.

blog.name: thatawkwardotaku
blog.title: That one fangirl.
blog.description: Hi my name is Mailla and Aoyama Yūga is my son.

summary: In one of your posts you add one of maga panels where deku said "his (aoyama) behavior left a strong impact "  Any predictions...
question: In one of your posts you add one of maga panels where deku said "his (aoyama) behavior left a strong impact "  Any predictions what Aoyama did / what his behavior was?
answer:
Hmm… Maybe he was talking about the cheese message he left that night or something

Or maybe he’s referring to something serious that happened later on, that we dont know about yet…

I have a theory that he might sacrifice himself for someone… Because, we all saw how he will sacrifice himself without any hesitation for his friends. When he saved Tokoyami, he sacrificed himself. During the hero liscense exam, he sacrificed himself for his whole class…

Maybe that’s like, a hint. A hint that one day, he’ll maybe do something more serious.

Or maybe, he’ll tell deku whos the traitor…Aaaah… I really don’t know

Or maybe, he’ll tell deku whos the traitor…Aaaah… I really don’t know

summary: Here's my piece for the @bakudekuflowerexchange, my giftee is @crossedeyes  My prompt was Amaryllis: Beauty, pride, and...
caption:
Here’s my piece for the @bakudekuflowerexchange, my giftee is @crossedeyes 

My prompt was Amaryllis: Beauty, pride, and attention. Specifically red ones also symbolize passion, love, and attraction.

 I’m very sorry this was so late, I had to redraw it simpler since I lost the original file;; I prepared some apology sketches but tumblr won’t let me include them;;

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Lullaby
description:
by TsunaidaMay

The soft sound of a Siren song is like a dream, luring you to fall asleep and drift away, never to be woken again. It entrances everyone it preys on. Well, everyone except Katsuki. For some reason this explosive blond sailor isn’t affected by the song that made his ship crash onto the rocks, taking him away as his eyes are soon to be opened up to a whole new world.

Words: 3329, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Sir Nighteye (My Hero Academia), Crimson Riot (My Hero Academia), Death Arms (My Hero Academia), Yosetsu Awase
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Sirens, Mermaids, Mermen, Siren song, bakudeku, Death, Sailing, Siren Deku, Stranded, Shipwreck, mentions of cannibalism, Drowning, How Do I Tag, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Partially deaf Bakugou Katsuki, MerMay, Sailor Bakugou Katsuki

summary: hi, I hope your week goes by well!! I would like to request smth with Todoroki!! maybe reader has a transformation quirk... and...
question: hi, I hope your week goes by well!! I would like to request smth with Todoroki!! maybe reader has a transformation quirk... and while hanging out with Todoboy she gets so overwhelmed by how CUTE!!! he is with his dumb questions and all, so she accidentally transforms into a dog?? breed doesn’t matter lol :D
answer:
thank you sweetheart! it really has gone well :D also sorry this is a little short :(

bork bork || shouto todoroki

Why did you agree to do this?

Your breath hitched sightly when Shouto finally came into view, a small smile slipping onto his lips when he greeted Midoriya, who had rushed off to go and get him. Your eyes were locked on him as Midoriya lead him over to your small group, comprised of yourself, Iida and Uraraka, and he joined you all at the small table you had all sat at. He easily joined the conversation, the smile he shot your way causing your heart to flutter wildly and you returned it awkwardly.

Dammit why was it so difficult for you to talk to him?

Uraraka and Iida marched you around various shops, Shouto keeping pace with Midoriya and you lagging behind them ever so slightly, eyes burning holes into the back of his head. Whenever he looked your way you averted your gaze hastily, and whenever he tried to talk to you all you could do was let out squeaks and one word replies. After shopping, Uraraka raced over to an ice cream stand, waving you all over wildly. You went to join her, studying the menu of options.

“What are you going to get?” You tensed when Todoroki’s breath hit the back of your neck, gnawing at your bottom lip as you turned around to face him. The space between his eyebrows was creased slightly as he concentrated on the menu, lingering on it for a moment before snapping his gaze back to you. A squeak left your lips, and you looked away shyly.

“Probably just chocolate…” you mumbled.

“But isn’t chocolate poisonous for dogs?”

“Huh?”

When you finally tore your eyes away from the ground you were struck by the concern marring his features, his eyebrows furrowed. “Your Quirk allows you to transform into a dog, right? And chocolate is poisonous to dogs. Won’t you get ill?”

Heat crept up your neck. “Oh! No! My Quirk doesn’t work like that I’ll be fine really!” you rushed out, ducking your head to hide your blush. You quickly stepped up to place your order, rushing over to a bench when the cone was handed to you and eating it anxiously, leg bouncing. You stiffened when he sat down beside you, and when you snuck a glance you were surprised to see him nonchalantly eating his own ice cream. The two of you sat in silence, eating your ice creams, until Todoroki leaned close to you suddenly.

“I’m sorry if this offends you, but do you have a urge to stiff butts whilst you’re in dog form?”

Poof.

A startled yelp escaped your lips as you fell onto the ground, fur blocking your vision as you rolled around, eventually finding your feet and shaking the fur out of your eyes. You instantly locked eyes with Todoroki, who was looking down at you in mild surprise. For a moment you were more than relieved to have accidentally transformed into your dog form - you would most certainly be blushing head to toe right now - but you were equally embarrassed by the sudden transformation.

You moved to transform back, but were stopped when a vanilla ice cream cone was positioned in front of your nose, the tantalizing smell tempting you. You resisted your urge to lick it, eyes snapping up to Todoroki once more, who smiled warmly at you, eyes brimming with affection.

“I heard dogs like vanilla ice cream.”

written on 02/05/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

reblog.comment:
thank you sweetheart! it really has gone well :D also sorry this is a little short :(

blog.name: fandom-addicts-yeah
blog.title: fandoms ruined our life
blog.description:
Our Masterlist.
The Fandoms we write for!
We're a multifandom writing blog!Just send in scenario, headcanons, ships, or even small drabble requests and we will do our best at satisfying your needs. SHIPS:CLOSED. SCENARIOS, HEADCANON, DRABBLES:OPEN

question: Any cute Kiribaku hcs?
answer:
• Bakugo whispers sweet nothings to Kirishima when he thinks he can’t hear him.
  • Bakugo cooks amazing dinners for their anniversaries (and anytime he feels like it for that matter).
  • Kirishima loves Bakugo’s hair!! He often pets him and while Bakugo acts mildly annoyed at first he fucking melts and often falls asleep in his lap.
  • Kirishima loves to sleep with his head on Bakugoțs chest, but usually it’s the other way around, cause Katsuki falls asleep at like, 8pm.    
  • Kirishima first made the comparison between Bakugo and the angry Pomeranian joke (you know the one) Bakugo hates it when anyone but Kiri makes the joke. His boyfriend has a free pass.
  • Kirishima absolutely loves fluffy dangerous animals and, whenever they go to the zoo, he wants to try to pet one using his quirk. While Bakugo is kind of curios to see if he could do it, he is more afraid of the thought of having is boyfriend mauled by a tiger.
  • When he feels extra in need of love, Kirishima just scoops Bakugo up like “hi it’s cuddle time now bitch”
  • But only when there’s the two of them by themselves.
  • KIRI IS A BLANKET HOG WHILE BAKUGO IS A BED HOG. At the start of the relationship, more often than not Bakugo ends up sprawled on the bed and Kiri on the floor with the blanket. Yet somehow they managed to still hold hands. Now that doesn’t happen as often since Kiri sleeps like…on Bakugo, so he can stay sprawled eagle style and they’re still both covered by the blanket.
  • Katsuki has Kiri in his phone some lame fluffy as shit like “❤️❤️❤️babe”
  • Kiri once saw it he just went
  • !!!!:DD
  • Also they have a doggo
  • A German shepherd
  • Bakugo bought him for Kiri’s birthday and the look of pure joy on Kiri’s face when he saw the smol pupper just…is something Katsuki will never forget.
  • And then when he thinks about it
  • it’s the same look of pure love Kiri has when he looks at him
  • And he’s just
  • Vv soft
  • Sometimes, when it’s a slow night and they spend time together, Bakugo looks at Kiri (who’s probably on the floor w/ their pupper because wtf are even chairs) and he just has this soft, serene look on his face, and a soft smile and he’s thinking “wow wtf did I do to deserve this fantastic fucker, the absolute love of my life”
  • Not entirely just Kiribaku but Denki edited the “I love you bitch” meme to have Bakugo and Kiri and when they showed it to them (the rest of the bakusquad) they expected Katsuki to blow up, but he just had that deadpan look and he just said “accurate”. Everybody was shooketh.

~mod Nyx

  • Kirishima loves to sleep with his head on Bakugoțs chest, but usually it’s the other way around, cause Katsuki falls asleep at like, 8pm.    
  • Kirishima first made the comparison between Bakugo and the angry Pomeranian joke (you know the one) Bakugo hates it when anyone but Kiri makes the joke. His boyfriend has a free pass.
  • Kirishima absolutely loves fluffy dangerous animals and, whenever they go to the zoo, he wants to try to pet one using his quirk. While Bakugo is kind of curios to see if he could do it, he is more afraid of the thought of having is boyfriend mauled by a tiger.
  • When he feels extra in need of love, Kirishima just scoops Bakugo up like “hi it’s cuddle time now bitch”
  • But only when there’s the two of them by themselves.
  • KIRI IS A BLANKET HOG WHILE BAKUGO IS A BED HOG. At the start of the relationship, more often than not Bakugo ends up sprawled on the bed and Kiri on the floor with the blanket. Yet somehow they managed to still hold hands. Now that doesn’t happen as often since Kiri sleeps like…on Bakugo, so he can stay sprawled eagle style and they’re still both covered by the blanket.
  • Katsuki has Kiri in his phone some lame fluffy as shit like “❤️❤️❤️babe”
  • Kiri once saw it he just went
  • !!!!:DD
  • Also they have a doggo
  • A German shepherd
  • Bakugo bought him for Kiri’s birthday and the look of pure joy on Kiri’s face when he saw the smol pupper just…is something Katsuki will never forget.
  • And then when he thinks about it
  • it’s the same look of pure love Kiri has when he looks at him
  • And he’s just
  • Vv soft
  • Sometimes, when it’s a slow night and they spend time together, Bakugo looks at Kiri (who’s probably on the floor w/ their pupper because wtf are even chairs) and he just has this soft, serene look on his face, and a soft smile and he’s thinking “wow wtf did I do to deserve this fantastic fucker, the absolute love of my life”
  • Not entirely just Kiribaku but Denki edited the “I love you bitch” meme to have Bakugo and Kiri and when they showed it to them (the rest of the bakusquad) they expected Katsuki to blow up, but he just had that deadpan look and he just said “accurate”. Everybody was shooketh.

~mod Nyx
